heisig_chinese_memo: This could be seen as a very accurate pictograph of another type of valley: a valley mouth open under the umbrella of inner labia, with the outer labia parted above. There are even more connections to be made among the primitive keywords and the visuals, but i will enter no further...
heisig_story: Go in . . . an umbrella . . . a mouth. Because of space restrictions, the element for go in is shortened in this character. If you stand on your head and look at this kanji, the image of a valley stands out more clearly: the mouth of the river whose water flows down at the intersection of the two mountains, with the final two strokes adding the element of perspective. Now get back on your feet again and see if the image still remains clear. If not, then return to the primitives and make a story in the usual way.

koohiiStory2: Think of the classic anime é¢¨ã®è°·ã®ãƒŠã‚¦ã‚·ã‚« (Nausicaa of the Valley of the Wind). We see Nausicaa entering the valley mouth gliding on an umbrella.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's a hat decorated with fins and (presumably fish) mouths on it. Who wears strange hats like this? Turns out, the valley people are the ones who wear these. I'm talking about the "Valley Girls" of California, Hollywood / LA. They're into the crazy fashion, and they'll wear anything if it's deemed "cool" or something like that.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a bunch of Valley Girls walking around with these strange hats. Fins and fish mouths... what a strange new fad.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Hanging around with all the Valley Girls in the sunny area of LA is also a robot. It's WALL-E's distant (and lazy, lounging relative), TAN-E (ãŸã«). He sits around getting a tan in LA with the Valley Girls while his cousin picks up trash.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: What a jerk he is. Imagine the deep tan lines on TAN-E as well. He's the epitome of robot laziness.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: There are different cereals in different parts of the world. Japan has samurai cereal. Great Britain has Crowned Wheat ... the United States and Russia have Missile cereals.
humanum_full_description_en:
The place where the two mountains are separated between the two mountains (Li Xiaoding). The " mouth " is like Gukou, which means valley. Xu Zhongshu believes that from " water " from " mouth ", like a stream flowing from a mountain stream into a plain. Li said it was more reasonable.

Oracle is used as a place name, and inscription means valley, referring to the narrow area between two mountains. Qiqi: "The Valley." It is also used as " Yu " to express abundance. He Zun: "Kai (Only) Wang Yan (Gong) Degu (Yu) Tian", praises Zhou Wang Desheng, which can be matched with heaven. Also used as a name.

The word " gu " in bamboo slips and silk is often read as desire, "Guodian Chu Jian. "Zun Deyi": "Don't harm the righteousness (ritual) with decree (addiction) and valley (desire)."

"Said Wen": "The spring flows out of the river as a valley. Half see from the water, and from the mouth. Every valley belongs to the valley." Duan Yucai's note: "Water is poured into the river and the river is called the valley." Cloud: "The river is not through the flowing water."
humanum_short_description_en: A separate inscriptions of like two mountains at (Lee Hyo set), " mouth " like Taniguchi, the original meaning of the valley.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[â‘ ] [gÇ”]
["Guangyun" Gu Lu cut, enter the house, see you. ]
(1) The water flow in the mountains.
(2) Refers to the tributaries of rivers in general.
(3) The passage of flowing water between the mountains.
(4) The place where the currents converge.
(5) In the deep recessed lowlands in the mountains, most of the exits are connected to the outside of the mountains.
(6) In ancient times, it was the name of the road in the mountains.
(7) Where the well contains water.
(8) Chinese medical terms. Often referred to as "brook". Gu refers to the gaps or depressions between the muscles of the limbs that touch each other, which is the place where the Qi and blood in the meridian is infused.
(9) See "Gu Shen".
(10) Through "valley". The general term for crops and grains.
(11) Tong "é«". Poor. The extension is a dilemma.
(12) Last name.
(13) Simplified word for "gu".

Meaning Mnemonic
There's a hat decorated with fins and (presumably fish) mouths on it. Who wears strange hats like this? Turns out, the valley people are the ones who wear these. I'm talking about the "Valley Girls" of California, Hollywood / LA. They're into the crazy fashion, and they'll wear anything if it's deemed "cool" or something like that.
Imagine a bunch of Valley Girls walking around with these strange hats. Fins and fish mouths... what a strange new fad.
Reading Mnemonic
Hanging around with all the Valley Girls in the sunny area of LA is also a robot. It's WALL-E's distant (and lazy, lounging relative), TAN-E (ãŸã«). He sits around getting a tan in LA with the Valley Girls while his cousin picks up trash.
What a jerk he is. Imagine the deep tan lines on TAN-E as well. He's the epitome of robot laziness.
